leitej.util.data

Interface DateTimerItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DateTimer

    public interface DateTimerItf
extends java.io.Serializable
    Objects implementing this interface gives responses like a timer.
    Author:
    Julio Leite

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasNextStep()
      Verifies if the timer has an other step in the future.
      boolean hasStarted()
      Verifies if the timer has already started.
      java.lang.Long milliSecondsRemainingToStep()
      Gives the remaining time to the next step.
      java.util.Date nextStepTimer()
      Gives the next step of the timer.

    • Method Detail

        Verifies if the timer has already started.

        Verifies if the timer has an other step in the future.
        Returns:

      • nextStepTimer

        java.util.Date nextStepTimer()
        Gives the next step of the timer.
        Returns:
        Date of the step or null if don't have it

        java.lang.Long milliSecondsRemainingToStep()
        Gives the remaining time to the next step.
        Returns:
